author: veithen
msg: Merged r944915 and r951385 to the 1.5 branch in order to fix the security issue described in CVE-2010-1632.

author: gstein
msg: Stash my experimental rebuild of APR pools and hash tables atop PoCore.
* memory/unix/apr_pools.c: revamp to use PoCore pools. a few functions
have no correspondence, but it all works fine otherwise
* tables/apr_hash.c: revamp to use PoCore hash tables
